DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this randomized, double-blinded, placebo-controlled, parallel trial is to determine whether consuming avenanthramide-enriched oats daily for 8 weeks on can improve biomarkers of inflammation in older, obese adults.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Avenanthramide-enriched Oats on Inflammation
